name: Mexican Black Bean & Avocado Wraps
preparation: Drain and rinse beans. In Multipurpose Steamer, combine beans and seasoning. Cover; microwave on high 2â€“3 min, or until warmed through. Once warmed, smash lightly with a fork.
Meanwhile, in small bowl, combine yogurt and lime juice. Set aside.
Dice bell pepper and avocado. Thinly slice spinach.
To assemble, spread 2 tbsp yogurt mix on each warm tortilla. Top with beans, bell pepper, avocado, and spinach. Roll tightly.
tips: Wraps are a perfect way to incorporate veggies into your meals. You can use any veggies you have on hand and pile on the goodness!
Swap Azteca Tortilla Soup Seasoning for Chili or Fajita Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup of your favourite veggies.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
